home.whoami: Hey there! I'm Aidan, a systems administrator, web developer, and student from the United States. I primarily work with Node.js and Linux.
home.interests: I am most interested in backend development and have experience with Node.js, Express, and Tailwind CSS. Despite my best efforts, I am no designer
home.arch: When I'm not programming, I can be found re-flashing my phone with a new custom ROM and telling everyone I use Arch.
